channel.title: DevolutionX || 24/7 Vps Hosted || Simplicity v2
channel.description:
Hey, we are DevolutionX ! We are a new server currently 24/7 vps server hosted with tons of features to play for!
Server Features - Double Xp Week ( Like the one now ) - Duo slayer - Donator shops , vote shops , donator zones - Loyalty titles such as " Dedicated " go behind your name. - Theres a shop for normal and Duo slayer - Castle Wars works 100% - Completionist Cape when you get 99 in ALL skills - Dice bag - Great clan chat system - Bank tabs work - We host daily d partys for the server to grow and expand - Great interface for the teleports - Extreme / Super Donators Get to change there yell name to whatever they want - Currently working on getting auto-donation , auto-vote on - Clue scrolls are when you click on them, they give you random items! - Mystery boxes also give you random items! - Minigames work fine! - Money Pouch works - Going to add Different xp Rates, such as extreme going down to Easy. - To see MORE you're going to have to come and play with us ! Right now, we are working on our forums at the moment.
Come and play and enjoy the server , its 24/7 !
[spoiler]Download[/spoiler] [spoiler]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/v6a8idgtxbhesgz/Devolution.jar[/spoiler]

item.title: DevolutionX || 24/7 Vps Hosted || Simplicity v2
item.dc:creator: @runehilates runehilates
item.description:
@runehilates wrote:

Hey, we are DevolutionX ! We are a new server currently 24/7 vps server hosted with tons of features to play for!

Server Features

  • Double Xp Week ( Like the one now )
  • Duo slayer
  • Donator shops , vote shops , donator zones
  • Loyalty titles such as " Dedicated " go behind your name.
  • Theres a shop for normal and Duo slayer
  • Castle Wars works 100%
  • Completionist Cape when you get 99 in ALL skills
  • Dice bag
  • Great clan chat system
  • Bank tabs work
  • We host daily d partys for the server to grow and expand
  • Great interface for the teleports
  • Extreme / Super Donators Get to change there yell name to whatever they want
  • Currently working on getting auto-donation , auto-vote on
  • Clue scrolls are when you click on them, they give you random items!
  • Mystery boxes also give you random items!
  • Minigames work fine!
  • Money Pouch works
  • Going to add Different xp Rates, such as extreme going down to Easy.
  • To see MORE youâ€™re going to have to come and play with us !
    Right now, we are working on our forums at the moment.

Come and play and enjoy the server , its 24/7 !
